languages.text: {n}Спустя несколько секунд одна из инфокрипт, вставленных в когитатор, начинает искрить. Еще через мгновение к ней присоединяется еще одна. Следующая, полыхнув пламенем, извергает вонючий чад. Голоса слуг Омниссии вокруг вас сбиваются с молитв, кто-то срывается в исступленное моление.{/n}

{n}After a few seconds, one of the data-crypts mounted on the cogitator begins to emit sparks. A moment later, another data-crypt does the same. The next bursts into flame and gives off foul-smelling smoke. Around you, the Omnissiah's servants break off from their prayers, and someone bursts into frantic pleading.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя несколько секунд одна из инфокрипт, вставленных в когитатор, начинает искрить. Еще через мгновение к ней присоединяется еще одна. Следующая, полыхнув пламенем, извергает вонючий чад. Голоса слуг Омниссии вокруг вас сбиваются с молитв, кто-то срывается в исступленное моление.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}After a few seconds, one of the data-crypts mounted on the cogitator begins to emit sparks. A moment later, another data-crypt does the same. The next bursts into flame and gives off foul-smelling smoke. Around you, the Omnissiah's servants break off from their prayers, and someone bursts into frantic pleading.{/n}

{n}After a few seconds, one of the data-crypts mounted on the cogitator begins to emit sparks. A moment later, another data-crypt does the same. The next bursts into flame and gives off foul-smelling smoke. Around you, the Omnissiah's servants break off from their prayers, and someone bursts into frantic pleading.{/n}

{n}After a few seconds, one of the data-crypts mounted on the cogitator begins to emit sparks. A moment later, another data-crypt does the same. The next bursts into flame and gives off foul-smelling smoke. Around you, the Omnissiah's servants break off from their prayers, and someone bursts into frantic pleading.{/n}

{n}After a few seconds, one of the data-crypts mounted on the cogitator begins to emit sparks. A moment later, another data-crypt does the same. The next bursts into flame and gives off foul-smelling smoke. Around you, the Omnissiah's servants break off from their prayers, and someone bursts into frantic pleading.{/n}

languages.text: {n}几秒种后，连接在沉思者上的其中一个数据密存器迸发出了火花。不一会儿，又一个装置也同样冒起了火花。随后，另一个装置冒起了火，发出了刺鼻的浓烟。在你周围，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人们停止了祈祷，其中一部分人爆发出了狂乱的恳求声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, one of the data-crypts mounted on the cogitator begins to emit sparks. A moment later, another data-crypt does the same. The next bursts into flame and gives off foul-smelling smoke. Around you, the Omnissiah's servants break off from their prayers, and someone bursts into frantic pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}几秒种后，连接在思考器上的其中一个数据加密装置迸发出了火花。不一会儿，又一个装置也同样冒起了火花。随后，另一个装置冒起了火，发出了刺鼻的浓烟。在你周围，欧姆尼塞亚的仆人们停止了祈祷，其中一部分人爆发出了狂乱的恳求声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}数秒後、考算機に搭載されたデータ・クリプトの1つが火花を散らし始める。しばらくして、もう1台のデータ・クリプトが同じように火を噴く。そして、今度は炎を上げ、悪臭を放つ煙が立ち込める。あなたの周りでは、万機神のしもべたちが祈りを中断し、誰かが必死で懇願し始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, one of the data-crypts mounted on the cogitator begins to emit sparks. A moment later, another data-crypt does the same. The next bursts into flame and gives off foul-smelling smoke. Around you, the Omnissiah's servants break off from their prayers, and someone bursts into frantic pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}数秒後、考算機に搭載されたデータ・クリプトの1つが火花を散らし始める。しばらくして、もう1台のデータ・クリプトが同じように火を噴く。そして、今度は炎を上げ、悪臭を放つ煙が立ち込める。あなたの周りでは、万機神のしもべたちが祈りを中断し、必死の形相で懇願している。{/n}
{n}数秒後、考算機に搭載されたデータ・クリプトの1つが火花を散らし始める。しばらくして、もう1台のデータ・クリプトが同じように火を噴く。そして、今度は炎を上げ、悪臭を放つ煙が立ち込める。あなたの周りでは、万機神のしもべたちが祈りを中断し、誰かが必死で懇願し始める。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einigen Sekunden sprühen aus einer der mit dem Cogitator verbundenen Daten-Krypten plötzlich Funken. Einen Moment später tut es ihr eine zweite gleich. Und schon geht die nächste in Flammen auf und sondert übel riechenden Rauch ab. Um dich herum brechen die Diener des Omnissiah ihre Gebete ab, und jemand fängt hektisch an zu flehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, one of the data-crypts mounted on the cogitator begins to emit sparks. A moment later, another data-crypt does the same. The next bursts into flame and gives off foul-smelling smoke. Around you, the Omnissiah's servants break off from their prayers, and someone bursts into frantic pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einigen Sekunden sprühen aus einer der mit dem Cogitator verbundenen Daten-Krypten plötzlich Funken. Einen Moment später tut es ihr eine zweite gleich. Und schon geht die nächste in Flammen auf und sondert übel riechenden Rauch ab. Um dich herum brechen die Diener des Omnissiah ihre Gebete ab, und jemand fängt hektisch an zu flehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au bout de quelques secondes, l'une des cryptes de données sur le cogitateur commence à faire des étincelles. L'instant d'après, c'est au tour d'un deuxième. Puis un troisième s'enflamme et dégage une fumée nauséabonde. Autour de vous, les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie interrompent leurs prières, et l'un d'entre eux se lance dans une supplication frénétique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, one of the data-crypts mounted on the cogitator begins to emit sparks. A moment later, another data-crypt does the same. The next bursts into flame and gives off foul-smelling smoke. Around you, the Omnissiah's servants break off from their prayers, and someone bursts into frantic pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout de quelques secondes, l'un des cryptes de données sur le cogitateur commence à faire des étincelles. L'instant d'après, c'est au tour d'un deuxième. Puis un troisième s'enflamme et dégage une fumée nauséabonde. Autour de vous, les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie interrompent leurs prières, et l'un d'entre eux se lance dans une supplication frénétique.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras unos segundos, una de las criptas de datos del cogitador empieza a soltar chispas. Al instante, otra cripta de datos sigue su ejemplo. La siguiente empieza a arder, liberando un humo apestoso. A tu alrededor, los sirvientes del Omnissiah interrumpen sus oraciones y uno de ellos se pone a rogar, desesperado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, one of the data-crypts mounted on the cogitator begins to emit sparks. A moment later, another data-crypt does the same. The next bursts into flame and gives off foul-smelling smoke. Around you, the Omnissiah's servants break off from their prayers, and someone bursts into frantic pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras unos segundos, una de las criptas de datos del cogitador empieza a soltar chispas. Al instante, otra cripta de datos sigue su ejemplo. La siguiente empieza a arder, liberando un humo apestoso. A tu alrededor, los sirvientes del Omnissiah interrumpen sus oraciones y uno de ellos se pone a rogar, desesperado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Birkaç saniye sonra, kavramsayara yerleştirilen veri mahzenlerinin birinden kıvılcım çıkmaya başlıyor. Kısa süre içinde başka bir veri mahzenine de aynısı oluyor. Derken bir sonraki alev alıp çevreye pis kokulu bir duman yayılıyor. Etrafındaki Hermesih hizmetkârları dualarını yarıda kesiyor ve birisi hummalı bir yakarışa başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}After a few seconds, one of the data-crypts mounted on the cogitator begins to emit sparks. A moment later, another data-crypt does the same. The next bursts into flame and gives off foul-smelling smoke. Around you, the Omnissiah's servants break off from their prayers, and someone bursts into frantic pleading.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Birkaç saniye sonra kavramsayara yerleştirilen veri mahzenlerinden birinden kıvılcım çıkmaya başlıyor. Kısa süre içinde başka bir veri mahzenine de aynısı oluyor. Bir sonrakini alev alıyor ve çevreye kötü kokulu bir duman yayılıyor. Etrafındaki Hermesih hizmetkârları dualarını yarıda kesiyor ve birisi hummalı bir yakarışa başlıyor.{/n}
